price: 24. En aan Hem is het om de schepen te laten varen over de zee, zo groot als bergen.
arabic: وَلَهُ ٱلۡجَوَارِ ٱلۡمُنشَـَٔاتُ فِي ٱلۡبَحۡرِ كَٱلۡأَعۡلَٰمِ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: walahu al-jawāri al-munshaātu fī al-baḥri kal-aʿlāmi
